COP_CUS_ID = #{copCusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where COP_NO = #{copNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PRJ_COP_ACC set COP_CUS_ID = #{copCusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COP_CUS_NAME = #{copCusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COP_CERT_TYPE = #{copCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COP_CERT_CODE = #{nextRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_ALTER_MSG = #{appAlterMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where COP_NO = #{copNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.prd_id as prdId,t2.prd_name as prdName, t.partner_no as partnerNo,t.partner_nm as partnerName, t3.cop_phone as partnerPhone,t3.cop_address as partnerAddress, t3.cop_cert_type as partnerCertType,t3.cop_cert_code as partnerCertCode, t.c_appnt as cAppnt from iqp_me_channel_prd t left join Prd_Basicinfo t2 on t.prd_id=t2.new_prd_code left join PRJ_COP_ACC t3 on t.partner_no=t3.cop_no where t.prd_id=#{prdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.cop_no=#{copNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.status='S'

select t.prd_id as prdId,t2.prd_name as prdName, t3.cop_no as partnerNo,t3.cop_cus_name as partnerName, t3.cop_phone as partnerPhone,t3.cop_address as partnerAddress, t3.cop_cert_type as partnerCertType,t3.cop_cert_code as partnerCertCode, t.c_appnt as cAppnt from iqp_me_channel_prd t left join Prd_Basicinfo t2 on t.prd_id = t2.new_prd_code left join PRJ_COP_ACC t3 on t3.cop_no =#{partnerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t.prd_id=#{prdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.cop_no=#{copNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.status='S'
